statements: SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_investment FROM investment_portfolio WHERE risk_exposure > 500.00;
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio WHERE total_investment >= 1000.00 ORDER BY portfolio_id DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, risk_exposure FROM investment_portfolio WHERE client_id = 12345 AND risk_exposure < 300.00;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name, total_investment FROM investment_portfolio WHERE client_id = 54321 ORDER BY total_investment DESC;
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio WHERE client_id = 100 ORDER BY total_investment DESC
SELECT portfolio_name, total_investment FROM investment_portfolio WHERE risk_exposure > 500 ORDER BY portfolio_name
SELECT portfolio_id, total_investment FROM investment_portfolio WHERE risk_exposure < 200 AND total_investment >= 10000
SELECT portfolio_name, total_investment, risk_exposure FROM investment_portfolio WHERE total_investment BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000 ORDER BY risk_exposure ASC
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio WHERE risk_exposure < 100 OR risk_exposure > 800 ORDER BY client_id
SELECT * FROM portfolios;
SELECT portfolio_name, risk_exposure FROM portfolios;
SELECT investment_name, amount FROM investments WHERE risk_level = 'high';
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT investment_name, amount, risk_level FROM investments ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM portfolios;
SELECT portfolio_name, risk_exposure FROM portfolios WHERE risk_exposure > 0.5 ORDER BY risk_exposure DESC;
SELECT I.investment_name, I.amount, P.portfolio_name FROM investments AS I JOIN portfolios AS P ON I.portfolio_id = P.portfolio_id WHERE I.amount > 10000 ORDER BY I.amount DESC;
SELECT P.portfolio_name, SUM(I.risk_exposure) AS total_risk_exposure FROM investments AS I JOIN portfolios AS P ON I.portfolio_id = P.portfolio_id GROUP BY P.portfolio_name;

SELECT P.portfolio_name, AVG(I.amount) AS avg_investment_amount FROM investments AS I JOIN portfolios AS P ON I.portfolio_id = P.portfolio_id GROUP BY P.portfolio_name HAVING avg_investment_amount > 5000 ORDER BY avg_investment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value FROM investment_portfolio;
SELECT * FROM investment_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Stock';
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM investment_assets WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value FROM investment_portfolio ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM investment_assets WHERE asset_type='Stock';

SELECT portfolio_name, SUM(asset_value) AS total_assets_value FROM investment_portfolio LEFT JOIN investment_assets ON investment_portfolio.id = investment_assets.portfolio_id GROUP BY portfolio_name;

SELECT investment_assets.asset_name, risk_exposure.risk_factor FROM investment_assets INNER JOIN risk_exposure ON investment_assets.asset_id = risk_exposure.asset_id WHERE risk_exposure.risk_factor > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name, total_value FROM portfolio ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT investment_id, investment_name, amount_invested, investment_date FROM investment WHERE amount_invested > 5000;
SELECT * FROM asset WHERE asset_type = 'Stock';
SELECT exposure_id, exposure_amount FROM exposure ORDER BY exposure_amount;
SELECT * FROM portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name, total_value FROM portfolio;
SELECT * FROM investment WHERE amount_invested > 1000;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM asset WHERE asset_type = 'Stock';
SELECT p.portfolio_name, a.asset_name, e.exposure_amount FROM portfolio p JOIN exposure e ON p.portfolio_id = e.portfolio_id JOIN asset a ON e.asset_id = a.asset_id;
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolios;
SELECT portfolio_name, risk_score FROM investment_portfolios WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, quantity FROM portfolio_assets ORDER BY asset_type DESC;
SELECT class_name, percentage FROM asset_classes INNER JOIN asset_allocations ON asset_classes.class_id = asset_allocations.class_id;
SELECT date, exposure FROM risk_metrics WHERE portfolio_id = 2 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolios;
SELECT portfolio_name, risk_score FROM investment_portfolios WHERE risk_score > 0.5;

SELECT p.portfolio_name, a.asset_name, aa.percentage FROM investment_portfolios p JOIN portfolio_assets a ON p.portfolio_id = a.portfolio_id JOIN asset_allocations aa ON a.asset_id = aa.asset_id WHERE p.portfolio_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM asset_classes WHERE class_name LIKE 'Equity%';
SELECT p.portfolio_name, r.exposure FROM investment_portfolios p JOIN risk_metrics r ON p.portfolio_id = r.portfolio_id WHERE r.date = '2021-10-15';
